Prodb API

Create pandas dataframe for manipulation

1.0 Generate Db

Initialise database with generate_db call.

{% raw %}

generate_db[source]

generate_db(dbpath='db.csv', cols=['col1', 'col2'], prefill=False)

Create example database

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
generate_db(cols=['c1', 'c4'])
df = pd.read_csv('db.csv')
df.head()

âœ“ðŸ’¾ db.csv (6 kb)
c1 c4
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
generate_db(prefill=True)
df = pd.read_csv('db.csv')
df.head()

âœ“ðŸ’¾ db.csv (96 kb)

2.0 Insert Row

{% raw %}

insert_row[source]

insert_row(df, data, dbpath='db.csv')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
data = {'name':'George', 'mood': 'ðŸ‘¹', 'message':'hi'}
df = insert_row(df, data)
display(df)
name mood message time_utc
0 Sam ðŸ˜Š hi 2021-11-02 19:53:29
1 Grant ðŸ˜µ hello 2021-11-02 19:53:29
2 George ðŸ‘¹ hi 2021-11-02 19:53:32
3 George ðŸ‘¹ hi NaN
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
data = {'time_utc' : arrow.utcnow().format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss'),
        'name': 'Luke', 
        'mood': 'ðŸ˜µ', 
        'message': 'hello from London, UK'}
df = insert_row(df, data)
display(df)

0 Sam ðŸ˜Š hi 2021-11-02 19:53:29
